rows.label: tlk70000121_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you really trying to put a stop
to that demon, the Holy Grail?

rows.label: tlk70000121_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I know I've made a lot of people
unhappy, but it all pales in comparison
to what the Holy Grail is doing.

rows.label: tlk70000121_05_msg0003
rows.name:
So you'll need to defeat the Holy
Grail to stop another generation
of children like me happening...

rows.label: tlk70000121_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Don't worry, I'm not
causing trouble any more.

rows.label: tlk70000121_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm going round the camps in Gula
and looking for survivors from the
villages that have been attacked.

rows.label: tlk70000121_05_msg0006
rows.name: Put an end to this tragedy, please!
